alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 14 at 1:24PM PST until November 16 at 7:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM TUESDAY TO 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Localized gusts to 70 mph in the most wind prone canyons. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire, San Diego County Valleys, San Bernardino County Mountains, Riverside County Mountains, Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills, San Diego County Mountains, San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...From 7 PM Tuesday to 7 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected for inland areas near the foothills on Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive.
